Text: Ostrogothic Ravenna:  During that time Ravenna saw a great renovation, in particular under Theodoric the Great (454–526).

Text: Ostrogothic Ravenna:  Theodoric attempted to model Ravenna as a capital equivalent to that of Rome or Constantinople and as such was a defender of classical antiquity in a western world that saw much of its classical heritage disappearing.
